snippet: Elliott Capital Management is trying an unusual tactic to collect on Argentina government bonds. An Argentine navy ship with more than 200 sailors was seized in Ghana, after an Elliott subsidiary applied for a Ghanaian court injunction, The Financial...
abstract: Elliott Capital Management is trying an unusual tactic to collect on Argentina government bonds. An Argentine navy ship with more than 200 sailors was seized in Ghana, after an Elliott subsidiary applied for a Ghanaian court injunction, The Financial Times reports. Read more »
lead_paragraph: Elliott Capital Management is trying an unusual tactic to collect on Argentina government bonds. An Argentine navy ship with more than 200 sailors was seized in Ghana, after an Elliott subsidiary applied for a Ghanaian court injunction, The Financial Times reports. Read more »

headline.main: Hedge Fund Does Battle at Sea
